system.description: Acid fog creates a billowing mass of misty vapors similar to solid fog. In addition to slowing creatures and obscuring sight, the vapors are highly acidic. Each round on your turn, the fog deals 2d6 points of acid damage to each creature and object within it.

components.materialDescription: A pinch of dried, powdered peas combined with powdered animal hoof.

system.target: Fog spreads in 20-ft. radius, 20 ft. high
